PROJECTS

Reha

Reha is a mobile dating app based on astrological predictions and theory. A team project for a client based in USA for the Indian Market. The astrological calculations relied on a library designed by me ( npm link ). The application's system design and architecture was done by me and that involved setting up a PostgreSQL, Express, Firebase Authentication, Firebase Cloud Messaging, AWS S3, React Native Stack. The development part of this app was given to the junior developers in the team of which I was the lead of. The app is currently in beta and soon awaiting Full Production Rollout. Please click view to join the Beta Program and become a tester!

View

Parkpoolr

Was my first project as an intern doing React, ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, and Firebase Authentication. The application provides an interface to make renting your parking space when you're not using it available to others. The project comprised of an iOS User Facing Application, an Admin Panel and a CMS (called Host Panel). The iOS application was built using React Native, Featuring react-native-maps, Google Directions, Google Places APIs, etc. The project is in production (The app is for the USA Market, so it won't be visible in the Indian Version of the Apple App Store) App Store Link (For Americans) : ParkPoolr

View

ABOUT

I am a fullstack software developer based in Bangalore. My stack generally revolves around React / React Native, NodeJS and the occasional Golang or Django.

Most recent freelance project was at Thinkify where I built a command line interface (CLI) which generates a fully functioning REST API from an Open API spec file.

Another freelance project was at Algokart where I used Flutter for their Mobile App and React for their Website to improve it and get it functioning. The project was an algorithmic trading platform.

I have one personal project which took a long time to achieve with the help of some seniors we were able to get some data and few users onboarded. Ucadd is an online learning platform which has carefully curated videos, tons of questions and perfect analysis to help you guide your JEE (Joint Entrance Examination) preparation to the absolute next level.
